animateLipidsDescription.value: Whether the phospholipids forming the cell membrane should be animated.

glucoseDrainDescription.value: Simulate phosphorylation of glucose in the cell after transport. Simulation assumes a high concentration of glucose inside the cell.

preferencesDialog.audio.sounds.stereoSou.value: Emphasize solute transport direction by mapping sound to right (outside to inside) and left (inside to outside) channels.

playAreaSummaryIntro.value:
An observation window zooms in on a cross-section of a cell's membrane.
  The membrane consists of a wiggling phospholipid bilayer, a double-layered sheet
  that separates fluids inside and outside of cell. When added to outside or inside,
  solute particles are suspended in fluid and randomly move with Brownian motion.

playAreaSummaryProteins.value: Transport proteins of different types can be added directly to membrane.

playAreaSummaryPotential.value: There are options to change cell environment and affect added proteins.

playAreaSummaryBarCharts.value: Bar charts of solute concentrations dynamically compare solute amounts outside and inside cell.

controlAreaSummary.value: You can pause action or slow it down to hear more details. Also, you can reset everything to start over.

interactionHint.value: Add or remove solute to outside or inside of cell.

interactionHintWithTransportProteins.value: Add or remove solutes to outside or inside of cell, and play with transport proteins.

accessibleContextResponse.value: Solutes cleared. Add solutes to observe changes

accessibleHelpText.value: Explore with or without visual highlights for solute crossings.

accessibleCheckedContextResponse.value: Visual highlights for solute crossings, on.

accessibleUncheckedContextResponse.value: Visual highlights for solute crossings, off.

accessibleHelpText.value: Explore with or without unique sounds for solute crossings.
Add up to 7 proteins to membrane. Use keyboard shortcuts to grab, sort, and release proteins into membrane.
Explore with or without charges showing membrane potential along inside and outside.

voicingHelpText.value: Explore with or without charge signs along membrane.

checkedContextResponseNegative70.value: Positive outside and negative inside; signs densely packed along membrane.

checkedContextResponseNegative50.value: Positive outside and negative inside; signs lightly packed along membrane.

checkedContextResponsePositive30.value: Negative outside and positive inside; signs sparse along membrane.

toolAccessibleHelpText.value: Grab transporter to pull to membrane.

accessibleHelpText.value: Grab a ligand. When grabbed, use keyboard shortcuts to move ligand to binding site. Release to bind or let ligands bind naturally.

ligandReleasedOnBusyOrIncompatibleProtei.value: Released. Binding unsuccessful. Ligand floats away.

soluteControlsAccessibleHelpText.value: Choose solute for adding or removing with Solute Adjusters.

outsideMembraneSpinnerHelpText.value: Adjust chosen solute amount on outside.

insideMembraneSpinnerHelpText.value: Adjust chosen solute amount on inside.

solute.value:
{ $soluteType ->
  [oxygen]        oxygen molecules
  [carbonDioxide] carbon dioxide molecules
  [sodiumIon]     sodium ions
  [potassiumIon]  potassium ions
  [glucose]       glucose molecules
 *[atp]           ATP molecules
}

soluteCapitalized.value:
{ $soluteType ->
  [oxygen]        Oxygen Molecules
  [carbonDioxide] Carbon Dioxide molecules
  [sodiumIon]     Sodium Ions
  [potassiumIon]  Potassium Ions
  [glucose]       Glucose Molecules
 *[atp]           Atp Molecules
}

soluteSpinnerObjectResponsePattern.value:
{ $amount ->
  [none] no
  [few] a few
  [some] some
  [smallAmount] small amount of
  [several] several
  [many] many
  [largeAmount] large amount of
  [hugeAmount] huge amount of
 *[maxAmount] max amount of
} { a11y_solute }

soluteBarChartsDescriptionParagraph.value: A barchart for each solute captures amounts on either side of membrane, recent crossings captured with visual highlights and sounds. If needed, pause sim to freeze details for reading.

arrowDirectionDescription.value:
{ $direction ->
[upward]   upward arrow indicates passage from outside to inside
*[downward] downward arrow indicates passage from inside to outside
}

barSizeDescription.value:
{ $amount ->
[aLittleMore]  A little more
[aLotMore]     A lot more
[aLittleLess]  A little less
*[aLotLess]     A lot less
} outside than inside

currentDetailsLeadingParagraph.value: Right now, zoomed-in cross section of cell has:

currentDetailsSoluteTypesOnOutside.value:
{ $count ->
  [one] { $count } added solute type on outside
 *[other] { $count } added solute types on outside
}

currentDetailsSoluteTypesOnInside.value:
{ $count ->
  [one] { $count } added solute type on inside
 *[other] { $count } added solute types on inside
}

currentDetailsTransportProteins.value:
{ $proteinCount ->
  [one] { $proteinCount} transport protein
  *[other] { $proteinCount} transport proteins
} of { $proteinTypeCount ->
  [one] { $proteinTypeCount } type
 *[other] { $proteinTypeCount} types
}, in membrane

currentDetailsLigands.value: 2 added ligand types on outside only

ligandToggleButtonAccessibleHelpText.value: Add or remove triangle- and star-shaped ligands to outside of cell.

grabbedLigandResponseWithHintPattern.value: { a11y_grabbedLigandResponsePattern } Move ligand with A or D keys. Space to release.

grabbedLigandResponseWithEmptyMembraneHi.value: { a11y_grabbedLigandResponsePattern } Space to release. Add transport proteins.

transportProteinBriefName.value:
{ $type ->
  [sodiumIonLeakageChannel]         Sodium Ion, Leakage
  [potassiumIonLeakageChannel]      Potassium Ion, Leakage
  [sodiumIonVoltageGatedChannel]    Sodium Ion, Voltage-Gated
  [potassiumIonVoltageGatedChannel] Potassium Ion, Voltage-Gated
  [sodiumIonLigandGatedChannel]     Sodium Ion, Ligand-Gated
  [potassiumIonLigandGatedChannel]  Potassium Ion, Ligand-Gated
  [sodiumPotassiumPump]             Sodium Potassium Pump
 *[sodiumGlucoseCotransporter]      Sodium-Glucose Cotransporter
}

ligandMovedAboveLigandGatedChannelPatter.value:
Above { $openOrClosed ->
[open]   open
*[closed] closed
} { a11y_transportProteinBriefName } { $ligandType ->
[triangleLigand] Triangle Site
*[starLigand]     Star Site
}, { $index } of { $transportProteinCount } Proteins.

ligandMovedAboveOtherChannelPattern.value:
Above { $openOrClosed ->
[open]   open
*[closed] closed
} { a11y_transportProteinBriefName }, { $index } of { $transportProteinCount } Proteins.
